Author: vikram
Content:
Though restricting the site to invitation only isn't a good idea.
Letting people invite friends that they know would be interested
from inside the site would be convenient.

Author: papersmith
Content:
>I up-voted a comment by mistake and there doesn't seem to be a way to remove my vote

It'd also be nice to have ajax for voting, so we don't have to re-scroll to find where we left off.
